question: Will the new site allow you to term coverage on a future specific date?
text:
Will the new site allow you to term coverage on a future specific date?
          
        
An individual who wants to terminate their coverage through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace will be able to choose a termination date set to the last day of the month of the termination request, the end of the following month, or the end of the next month after that. Enrollees will still need to pay their premium through the month in which they choose to terminate coverage.
